name: APPLE iPhone SE
Description: Widescreen HD LCD Retina Multi-touch IPS Display (1400:1 Contrast Ratio (Typical), True Tone Display, Wide Color Display (P3), Haptic Touch, 625 nits Max Brightness (Typical), Fingerprint-resistant Oleophobic Coating, Display Zoom, Reachability)

name: APPLE iPhone 11
size: 15.49 cm (6.1 inch) Liquid Retina HD Display
camera: 12MP Dual Rear Cameras, 12MP TrueDepth Front Camera
Description: Liquid Retina HD display with True Tone, Wide color, and Haptic Touch. A13 Bionic chip with third-generation Neural Engine. Face ID for secure authentication.

name: APPLE iPhone 12
size: 15.49 cm (6.1 inch) Super Retina XDR Display
Description: Super Retina XDR OLED display, Ceramic Shield front, aerospace-grade aluminum edges, A14 Bionic chip with Neural Engine.

name: APPLE iPhone 12 Pro
size: 15.49 cm (6.1 inch) Super Retina XDR Display
camera: 12MP Triple Rear Cameras with LiDAR, 12MP Front Camera
Description: Ceramic Shield, A14 Bionic, Pro camera system with Telephoto, Wide, and Ultra Wide cameras, LiDAR Scanner for Night mode portraits and AR experiences.

name: APPLE iPhone 13
size: 15.49 cm (6.1 inch) Super Retina XDR Display
camera: 12MP Dual Rear Cameras with Sensor-Shift OIS, 12MP Front Camera
Description: Super Retina XDR display with HDR, A15 Bionic chip, Cinematic mode in 1080p at 30 fps, improved battery life.

name: APPLE iPhone 13 Pro
size: 15.49 cm (6.1 inch) Super Retina XDR Display with ProMotion
camera: 12MP Pro Camera System with Telephoto, Wide, Ultra Wide, 12MP Front Camera
Description: ProMotion technology with adaptive refresh rates up to 120Hz, Ceramic Shield, LiDAR Scanner, Photographic Styles.

name: APPLE iPhone 14

camera: 12MP Dual Rear Cameras with Photonic Engine, 12MP TrueDepth Front Camera
Description: Crash Detection, Emergency SOS via satellite, improved low-light photography, A15 Bionic chip.
